name: Mind Sweeper
description:
You are a Mind Sweeper. You erase the memories that people pay you to erase. The procedure can be fatal if not done with care and precision. Don't throw their life away, just do your job.

CONTROLS:

(Obviously this is a Mine Sweeper clone)

Left click to "reveal" squares. if you left click a "mine" you lose.

Right click to "mark" a square as a mine. Correctly mark every mine and you win.

Game created by Anthony Pascone

Music created by CloudyDayMusic
